import React, {useState} from "react"; import filtersvg from "../../resources/icon-svg/filter.svg"; import {ReactSVG} from "react-svg"; import {Redirect} from "react-router"; import {connect} from "react-redux"; import {setIsAuth} from "../../state/app-reducer"; import LogoDronTaxi from "../../resources/icon-svg/LogoDronTaxi.svg"; import {NavLink} from "react-router-dom"; import './Profile.css' import clearProfile from './../../resources/img/clear-prof.png' import ProfileReduxForm from "../ReduxForms/ProfileReduxForm/ProfileReduxForm"; let Profile = (props) => { const [tab, setTab] = useState(true) const [role, setRole] = useState(null) let a = [{ id: 0, name: "role1", sys_name: "rolexxx", date: '34.324.34', date_f: '34.2343.43', func: [{id: 0, sfuncname: 'rrrr'}, {id: 1, sfuncname: 'bbbbb'}] }, { id: 1, name: "role2", sys_name: "rolexxx", date: '34.324.34', date_f: '34.2343.43', func: [{id: 0, sfuncname: 'dfdfd'}, {id: 1, sfuncname: 'ggggg'}] }] return (props.isAuth !== 'false') ? : ( <>

setRole(e.currentTarget.id)} id={r.id}>
{r.name}
)}

)}

{f.sfuncname}
)}
}
}
) } const mapStateToProps = (state) => ({ isAuth: state.appReducer.isAuth }) export default connect(mapStateToProps, {setIsAuth})(Profile);
